name: SegaSonic Popcorn Shop
overview: SegaSonic Popcorn Shop is a popcorn vending machine. It dispenses three flavors: salted, butter, and curry. The twist: it's also an arcade game. The player chooses their flavor, then begins the minigame. Gameplay consists of turning a crank to help Tails get the corn kernels over the fire while Sonic supervises. Whether the player succeeds or not, the popcorn is microwaved and dispensed.
